misc: Rarely seen on the course without a drink in his hand
biography: Martin, a familiar face at St. Laurence Golf, is known for his relaxed demeanor and is rarely seen on the course without a drink in hand. A true sportsman, Martin's jovial attitude makes him a popular figure among fellow golfers.

With nine past appearances at the Hector Trophée, Martin brings a wealth of experience to the competition. His dedication and skill have translated into tangible success, as he has secured the coveted Hector Trophée once. Furthermore, Martin has distinguished himself as an exceptional individual player, earning the Victor Trophy on one occasion.
As he prepares for his tenth appearance at the Hector Trophée in 2025, Martin undoubtedly aims to leverage his experience and continue his pursuit of excellence in the tournament.
